1100011111101111 1010100101010101 1 -> sum: 0111000101000101, cout: 1
0101001101010010 1101100011110001 0 -> sum: 0010110001000011, cout: 1
1010010110011100 1011101001101001 1 -> sum: 0110000000000110, cout: 1

0011101100010111 1001000100011101 0 -> sum: 1100110000110100, cout: 0
0010001000001111 0101101100000010 1 -> sum: 0111110100010010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
